The Bull Case - A Football Analytics Blog
A football analytics blog/newsletter where I share data analysis and modelling relating to football with a focus on the Premier League.
Team Strength Model
An ensemble Dixon-Coles inspired model using xG and Goals to estimate team strength and predict match outcomes.
